DOC.brief_summary: This study recruit 20 healthy adult ( male female ) complete 9 study visit consume different food product ( chili , soup muffin ) without lentil incorporate . Blood sample obtain finger prick 2 hour meal analyze glucose insulin .
DOC.brief_title: Postprandial Blood Glucose Insulin Levels Following Consumption Lentil-containing Food Products
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose current study determine effect lentil-containing food product postprandial blood glucose insulin level healthy premenopausal woman men age 18-40 year old.This study use randomize crossover design . Participants complete series 9 study visit participant consume 9 study treatment meal consist muffin , soup chilli , without lentil . Participants blood sample follow 2 hour finger prick . Participants remain seated test period . All study visit occur Human Nutraceutical Research Unit separate washout period 3-7 day . Throughout study , ask participant ' lifestyle physical activity remain unchanged . Participants instruct start new dietary approach , start new natural health product ( unless instruct physician ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Age 1840 year ( aim equal distribution among 1829 , 3040 year age ) BMI 2030 kg/m2 Diabetes ( fast blood glucose â‰¥7.0 mmol/L and/or 2hr blood glucose > 11.1 mmol/L post75g OGTT ) 1 Impaired Glucose Tolerance ( IGT ) ( Fasting blood glucose 6.16.9 mmol/L and/or 2hr blood glucose 7.811.0 mmol/L post75g OGTT ) 1 Blood pressure > 140/90 mm Hg Any major medical condition include history AIDS hepatitis Medical surgical event require hospitalization within 3 month randomization Any medication except stable dose ( 3 month ) oral contraceptive , blood pressure statin medication Natural health product ( NHPs ) use glycemic control ( NHPs okay long table 3 month ) Tobacco use Probiotic supplement use Dietary fibre supplement use Pulse consumption > 4 serving per week Food allergy nonfood life threaten allergy Alcohol consumption > 14 drinks/week > 4 drinks/sitting Recent intend significant weight loss gain ( > 4 kg previous 3 month ) Elite athletes Shift worker
